评论概述: DON'T GET BURNED ON THIS RETURN POLICY!
评论详情: This short set is way off on sizing! Shirt is very short for sizing! And  WARNING if you have to return it! Shame on Amazon also for not letting you know that it has to be returned to China and you have to pay for oversees shipping plus deal with customs forms! It cost the same to send it back as the purchase price! Amazon refunded money, but wouldn't let you send it to them! STAY AWAY FROM THIS VENDOR'S PRODUCTS! China poorly made products!! Amazon why have this kind of vendor and then not warn people clearly that you have to pay shipping to China to return!!!!

I normally wear size large clothing and my son wears extra large. I ordered this outfit in large for myself and one for my son in extra large. I found that the sizing on this outfit as well as others that we ordered from vendors shipping directly out of China to be almost two sizes too small. I could barely get the size large shirt on and even after trying on my son's extra large it too was also too small. Additionally, these shorts seem more like pajama bottoms. Wide elastic waist band, no fly, no pockets. The material for both are VERY light weight. They almost feel like woven plastic, like dolls clothing.
